import React from "react"; import Navbar from "./Navbar"; import emailjs from '@emailjs/browser'; export default function Contact(){ const form = useRef(); const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs.sendForm('service_32a2pld', 'template_q9n92ou', form.current, 'YOUR_PUBLIC_KEY') .then((result) => { console.log(result.text); }, (error) => { console.log(error.text); }); }; return(
) }
